price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߛߊ߲ߖߌ ߘߏ߫ ߟߊߓߐߙߐ߲ߘߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߸ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߟߊ߬ߓߊ߰ߕߐ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ߖߌ ߖߎ߯ߦߊ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
